lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic had 100 million reasons to celebrate reaching the French Open quarter-finals on Wednesday -- albeit two days later than expected -- as players finally cleared the fourth-round backlog created by the fickle Parisian weather.
snippet: Novak Djokovic had 100 million reasons to celebrate reaching the French Open quarter-finals on Wednesday -- albeit two days later than expected -- as players finally cleared the fourth-round backlog created by the fickle Parisian weather....

headline.main: Djokovic Enters $100 Million Dollar Club, Serena Plays Catch-Up
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Enters $100 Million Dollar Club, Serena Plays Catch-Up
